item.title: Extreme heat hitting Northeast, West: Latest on the scorching temperatures
item.description: Extreme heat is hitting both coasts, bringing dangerously high temperatures to the Northeast, Northwest and Southwest.

item.title: Trump's remarks on homelessness in DC spark concerns among homeless advocates
item.description: President Donald Trump vowed this week to rid Washington, D.C., of homeless encampments, though what those plans will look like are unclear.

item.title: Coast Guard suspends search for fisherman after boat with 4 crew members capsizes
item.description: The United States Coast Guard has suspended the search for a missing fisherman after a vessel with four people on it capsized in 7-foot swells off the...

item.title: WATCH: Supreme Court formally asked to overturn landmark same-sex marriage ruling
item.description: Ten years after the U.S. Supreme Court extended marriage rights to same-sex couples, the justices will consider for the first time whether to take up ...

item.title: WATCH: Welcome to Emmy the Labrador's neighborhood
item.description: A Labrador in Southern California has gone viral on TikTok after her owner trained her to ring a special doorbell so she can visit their neighbors.
